description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
        Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

New Features

PDFNEWNET-36614	Extract text based on columns
PDFNEWNET-37211	Identify if image in PDF is Colored or Black & White
PDFNEWNET-36693	Extract RawFormat from XImages from PDFDocument.Pages.Resources.Images
PDFNEWNET-36338	Setting Header/Footer once for new PDF document
PDFNEWNET-37393	Integrate Imaging into Aspose.Pdf
PDFNEWNET-37542	Extract table borders as image

Enhancements

PDFNEWNET-37830	Improve on-fly resources optimization
PDFNEWNET-36469	How to set printer driver setting
PDFNEWNET-37125	XSL-FO to PDF - Font Name issue

Exceptions

PDFNEWNET-37208	Font not found exception when saving PDF document
PDFNEWNET-37778	Exception while loading PDF document
PDFNEWNET-37768	Document() method throws ArgumentNullException
PDFNEWNET-37825	Exception while opening PDF document
PDFNEWNET-37874	Multi-column section followed by another section on same page crashes during save
PDFNEWNET-37688	OutOfMemory exception during PDF merge
PDFNEWNET-34509	XslLoadException during XML to PDF conversion
PDFNEWNET-37627	PDF to PDF/A - OutOfMemoryException during conversion

Bugs

PDFNEWNET-37689 When trying to concatenate PDF files, the application hangs
PDFNEWNET-37759 PDF to Image - Arrow of line Annotation is missing in resultant file
PDFNEWNET-37252	PDF to HTML - Transparent text loses its transparency after conversion
PDFNEWNET-37341	PDF to HTML: Incorrect output HTML-missing images
PDFNEWNET-37789	Border appearance changes with zoom factor
PDFNEWNET-37749	Text replace changes font face to Times New Roman
PDFNEWNET-37748	TextFragmentAbrober issue: Font of text is changed in output PDF file.
PDFNEWNET-37819	PDF Table cells rowspan not working, when page breaks
PDFNEWNET-37851	Incorrect text generated
PDFNEWNET-37691	Merging the pages of same PDF increases the resultant file size
PDFNEWNET-37870 Old generator does not throws IOException on a locked file
PDFNEWNET-37705 TextFragmentAbsorber getting incorrect position of text position and occurrences
PDFNEWNET-34894	TextFragmentAbsorber behaving abnormally
PDFNEWNET-37527	PDF to PNG: output image is too small
PDFNEWNET-36142	OptimizeResources(..) method is not reducing file size
PDFNEWNET-30840	Issue while adding Text to an existing PDF document
PDFNEWNET-36181	PDF to HTML - Hyperlink is removed in resultant file
PDFNEWNET-37729	Image object is returning inorrect resolution value
PDFNEWNET-37875	When adding Image to table cell and setting Image height, application hangs
PDFNEWNET-37517	PDF to HTML conversion throws OutOfMemoryException
PDFNEWNET-35543	Text is printing with thicker lines
PDFNEWNET-37790	Tables appearance issue
PDFNEWNET-37826	Added footer overflowing the document
PDFNEWNET-37359	PDF to JPEG - page contents are distorted
PDFNEWNET-37804	TimeZone is removed from ModifyDate field
PDFNEWNET-37692	OptimizeResources() method makes PDF unreadable
PDFNEWNET-37631	PDF to TIFF - Euro sign mangled in output file
PDFNEWNET-37816	PDF to JPEG - Characters are incomplete on resultant image
PDFNEWNET-37723	Filling form with AutoFiller loses the javascript
PDFNEWNET-37695	Image count issue
PDFNEWNET-37756	Error when Image field is flattened
PDFNEWNET-37807	PDF to PDFA: compliance failure
PDFNEWNET-37774	TOC expanding beyond one page resultants in incorrect hyperlinks
PDFNEWNET-37344	Checkbox field types don't always get checked in PDF
PDFNEWNET-37755	Problem concatenating PDF files using PdfFileEditor
PDFNEWNET-37810	PDF to JPEG: White rectangle instead of image's part
PDFNEWNET-37750 Text replace increases space between letters
PDFNEWNET-34894 TextFragmentAbsorber behaving abnormally
PDFNEWNET-37419 PDF to XLS: Two columns merged into a single column
summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
